list.name: Errors
list.query: select error,phase from mcsbackup_status where successful='false' and namespace='$namespace' and workload='$workload' and phase!='overall' and $timeFilter ORDER BY time ASC limit 20

target.name: Errors
target.query: select error,phase from mcsbackup_status where successful='false' and namespace='$namespace' and workload='$workload' and phase!='overall' and $timeFilter ORDER BY time ASC limit 20

description: All low-level stats for one backup instance

panels.description: Status = 0 indicates that the respective phase failed. Any non-zero Value indicates successful completion of the respective phase (1=start, 2=prepare (pre-backup hook), 3=backup, 4=forget, 5=prune, 6=getstats, 7=s3stats, 8=wrapup (post-backup-hook), 9=overall). As long as phase "backup" was successful, a usable backup was created. All later phases are just housekeeping and statistics collection tasks.
panels.title: Status

list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mcsbackup_status WITH key=namespace

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mcsbackup_status WITH key=instance WHERE namespace='${namespace:raw}'
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mcsbackup_status WITH key=instance WHERE namespace='${namespace:raw}'

title: Backup  Workload Details
